thread.section_title: Manuel Bozzi Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per Manuel Bozzi | manuelbozzi.it
thread.title: Grace Lindley
thread.title_full: Manuel Bozzi recensione scritta da Grace Lindley

author: Grace Lindley
title: Grace Lindley
text: I was blown away by the customer service of Manuel Bozzi, they went out of their way to help me and my order was in my hands only 24h after I placed the order. When it arrived it was beautifully wrapped and the piece of jewellery is just perfect. I cannot recommend Manuel Bozzi enough!
